thread.title: Chris Bailey becomes COO of Centara Hotels & Resorts
thread.title_full: Chris Bailey becomes COO of Centara Hotels & Resorts

author: Bangkok, August 11, 2015
title: Chris Bailey becomes COO of Centara Hotels & Resorts
text:
Chris Bailey becomes COO of Centara Hotels & Resorts Bangkok, August 11, 2015 
CENTARA Hotels & Resorts has promoted Chris Bailey from senior vice president of sales and marketing to COO. 

Bailey first joined Centara in 2004, when the company only had a portfolio of eight properties, and oversaw its growth strategy that has helped propel the brand to its current portfolio of over 70 properties. 

Credit: Centara Hotels & Resorts 

In his new role, Bailey will continue to oversee sales and marketing, adding operations and management of Centaraâ€™s various corporate entities to the mix.
